name: Meat and Loaf
description:
You play as a cat named Loaf, searching for their housemate, a dog named Meat, who has run away. Loaf tries to find Meat and bring him back. In the process, Loaf meets three mice who help them by providing clues and advice.

Controls: 

  • arrows to move around
  • shift to sprint
  • esc to open menu
  • enter to interact with objects, select options, and progress dialog

Notes: 

  • I couldn't export it to macOS or HTML because GMS is being weird idk
